title: Greencore USA Recalls Meat, Poultry Products Produced Without Benefit of Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, April 29, 2016 Greencore USA, Inc., a North Kingstown, R.I. establishment, is recalling approximately 1,341 pounds of meat and poultry products that were produced without the benefit of federal inspection and outside inspection hours, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service...
